name: 吉奥夫·怀特
birth_place: 加拿大,安大略省,利明顿
introduction: Graduated from the University of Windsor in 2004 with a Bachelor of Arts in Media Studies and Communications.Graduated from The Vancouver Film School in 2005 with a diploma in Film Production.Co-Produced and worked as a 1st AD on the Bif Naked music video entitled, "My Greatest Masterpiece."Wrote, produced, and directed several short films and music videos while attending University.(2010) Is currently in development on first feature film entitled "Gong Show."
